Configuring the NymÂ¶

Configure Nym Tab

On the Configure Nym tab you can modify the Pseudonymous Name, Ephemeral Key and hSub key of your nym (both keys can be automatically generated by nymphemeral). Clicking on Configure will create the message that will be sent to the server. If you wish to not use your nym anymore, click Delete Nym.

Tip

If you believe that the server is not processing your messages, try to change the Ephemeral Key so that the databases will be synced.
